name: Angewomon
effect: [When Attacking] If you have 3 or more security cards, 1 of your opponent's Digimon and all of your opponent's Security Digimon get -3000 DP for the turn.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When a card is added to your security stack, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -2000 DP for the turn.
